title.rendered: Watch: Stuart Bladen speaks at UK Investor Show 2017

content.rendered: Earlier this month, our CEO Stuart Bladen took to the stage at the UK Investor Show 2017 to discuss the latest developments in the cyber security market and why investors should be excited by what’s ahead for the Falanx Group.

excerpt.rendered: Earlier this month, our CEO Stuart Bladen took to the stage at the UK Investor Show…
